about_the_game:
We will rise a monument (pillar) on your honor with your name (or nickname)! In the Temple District, by the Temple of the goddness Morrigu, we will rise you pillar. On mouse over the pillar, your name (or nickname) will be visible. It will be seen in all the games over the world, assuming they get updated.
I will add backers´ pillars at the end of the month. If you need it faster (e.g. a gift for someone else), please let me know it so I could try to add it faster.
Become a Backer of The Essence Reaper Ritual! When getting this DLC, email your receipt to our support email along the name you wish to add to our Backer List. This list will be added at the end of the rest of Backers under the section "DLC Backers".
Income will be used to add more assets, make locations more realistic. I am an Indie for a passion for videogames, not a studio well funded.
This package does not add any new asset, just your name to the Backers list. You may access the Backers List from the Main Menu of the videogame.

Thanks!

content_descriptors.notes:
Fantasy battles, combats involving melee, ranged weapons and magic. Enemies die permanently. Some blood is displayed when enemies or characters are hit. 
Same content as the main videogame The Essence Reaper Ritual.
